document.full_text: the general manager of a battery plant in eastern china faces environmental pollution charges after lead emissions from the plant poisoned nearly 170 villagers, including 53 children, state news agency xinhua reported on sunday.
document.title: china plant manager held in lead poisoning case
lines_and_colors: the general manager of a battery plant in eastern china faces environmental pollution charges after lead emissions from the plant poisoned nearly 170 villagers, including 53 children, state news agency xinhua reported on sunday.
